entry.title: [CW] For those not following Russia’s invasion of Ukraine closely, Ukraine has been p
entry.content:
For those not following Russia’s invasion of Ukraine closely, Ukraine has been projecting a counter offensive in the Kherson region for two months, and they initiated it two days ago.
It is still very early and the Fog of War is thick, but I think we are about a week until we will have a good idea of how the counter offensive is (or was) going and that will tell us a lot about the future of the conflict.
